channel.title: Cost-Cutting Measures on FinanClub

item.title: VFC
item.description: score:27 Chances: VF Corp. operates in the apparel, footwear, and accessories industry, which continues to show resilience and growth potential despite challenges. The company’s Outdoor, Active, and Work segments offer a diversified product portfolio catering to different consumer needs and interests. Nina Flood’s appointment as interim global brand president after the departure of Susie Mulder indicates a proactive approach to leadership and management.
